name: lsTimeFormat
description:
Formats the time part of a date/time string into a string in a locale-specific format.
 [mask - quicky]
 h,hh,H,HH: Hours; m,mm: Minutes; s,ss: Seconds;
 l: Milliseconds; t: A or P; tt: AM or PM
 "short" = h:mm tt; "medium" = h:mm:ss tt

coldfusion.notes: Member function is available in CF2016+.

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.description: lsTimeFormat returns a time value using the locale convention.
examples.code: #locale# #lsTimeFormat(now())# #lsTimeFormat(now(), 'hh:mm:ss')# #lsTimeFormat(now(), 'hh:mm:sst')# #lsTimeFormat(now(), 'hh:mm:sstt')# #lsTimeFormat(now(), 'HH:mm:ss')#
